channel.title: How do i change the port that my server runs off of? please help me!
channel.description:
hi my aultimate pk server curently runs off of a 0.0.0.0:5555 port and i need to change it so people can log onto my server with out having to change the port the port i need is 0.0.0.0:43594
PLEASE HELP ME I CAN'T FIGURE IT OUT!!! PLEASE TY

item.title: How do i change the port that my server runs off of? please help me!
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

go to server file and look for public static server clientHandler = null; // handles all the clients public static java.net.ServerSocket clientListener = null; public static boolean shutdownServer = false; // set this to true in order to shut down and kill the server public static boolean shutdownClientHandler; // signals ClientHandler to shut down public static int serverlistenerPort = 43594; //43594=defaut make the 43596 or what ever urs is to wat ever u want

Read full topic
